headline: Why Is Axon (AXON) Pursuing Big M&A Amid Margin Pressures and Mixed Results?
summary: Axon Enterprise recently reported third-quarter results, showcasing strong revenue growth to US$710.64 million but also announcing an earnings miss and a net loss, alongside plans to acquire Carbyne for approximately US$625 million to expand its emergency communications offerings. This combination of robust sales performance, margin pressures, and a major acquisition highlighted both Axon's ongoing innovation in public safety technology and growing concerns over costs and future...
